thread.section_title: Rydges Kensington London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Stay
thread.title_full: Lovely Stay - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Laine29
title: Lovely Stay
text: We only stayed one night and wished it could be longer. From check in to check out the staff were friendly and helpful. The choice of food for breakfast was great and all very good. Our room was clean and comfortable. The area around the hotel is good and its very close for V&A and the Natural History Museum. We will be back.
